data: PED ENDO Non Diabetes Related Hypoglycemia for Age 1 to 5 Years (Module)
Status
If patient is diabetic refer to PED ENDO Hypoglcemia for Patients with Diabetes Mellitus (Module)
This powerplan applies to children greater than or equal to 3 months of age who do NOT have diabetes mellitus and who have a blood sugar less than 3.5 mmol/L or 4 mmol/L with hypoglycemia symptoms
All glucose checks to be done by glucometer
Patient Care
Insert Peripheral IV (Intravenous) Catheter
T;N
Notify Treating Provider
Notify provider if patient cannot tolerate oral glucose / feed or is unconscious and/or seizing or if POC Glucose Whole Blood is less than 3 mmol/L
POC Glucose Whole Blood
PRN
Diet/Nutrition
STEP 1: For patients 1 to 5 years of age with blood sugar 3 to 4 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 1 is between 3 mmol/L and 3.5 mmol/L give oral feed as ordered by provider.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 1 is between 3.5 mmol/L and 4 mmol/L with symptoms of hypoglycemia give oral feed as ordered by provider.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute
STEP 2: If repeat blood glucose less than 3 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is less then 3 mmol/L following step 1 management. Notify provider and adminster 6g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is less than 3 mmol/L following step 1 management, administer glucagon.  Notify provider if glucagon administered
STEP 2: If repeat blood glucose 3 to 3.5 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3 mmol/L following Step 2 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.  Notify provider if repeat blood glucose is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.1 mmol/L following Step 2 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.  Notify provider if repeat blood glucose is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.2 mmol/L following Step 2 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.  Notify provider if repeat blood glucose is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.3 mmol/L following Step 2 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.  Notify provider if repeat blood glucose is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.4 mmol/L following Step 2 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.  Notify provider if repeat blood glucose is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.5 mmol/L following Step 2 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute.  Notify provider if repeat blood glucose is less than 3.5 mmol/L
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3 mmol/L following step 2 management, adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.1 mmol/L following step 2 management, adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.2 mmol/L following step 2 management, adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.3 mmol/L following step 2 management, adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.4 mmol/L following step 2 management, adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.5 mmol/L following step 2 management, adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute.  Notify provider with result
STEP 2: If repeat blood glucose greater than 3.5 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is greater than or equal to 3.5 mmol/L following Step 1 management no further action needed
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is greater than or equal to 3.5 mmol/L after Step 1 management, recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if result is less than 3.5 mmol/L
STEP 1: For patients 1 to 5 years of age with blood sugar less than 3 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 1 is less than 3 mmol/L adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute
STEP 2: If repeat blood glucose less than 3 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is less than 3 mmol/L following step 1 management adminster 6 g of fast acting carbohydrate. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is less than 3 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster glucagon.  Notify provider if glucagon administered
STEP 2: If repeat blood glucose between 3 to 3.5 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3 mmol/L following step 1 management, notify provider
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.1 mmol/L following step 1 management, notify provider
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.2 mmol/L following step 1 management, notify provider
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.3 mmol/L following step 1 management, notify provider
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.4 mmol/L following step 1 management, notify provider
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.5 mmol/L following step 1 management, notify provider

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3 mmol/L following Step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.1 mmol/L following Step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.2 mmol/L following Step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.3 mmol/L following Step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.4 mmol/L following Step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is 3.5 mmol/L following Step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered by provider. Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L
If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 less than 3 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster 6 g fast acting carbohydrate.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 less than 3.1 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster 6 g fast acting carbohydrate.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 less than 3.2 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster 6 g fast acting carbohydrate.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 less than 3.3 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster 6 g fast acting carbohydrate.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 less than 3.4 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster 6 g fast acting carbohydrate.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 less than 3.5 mmol/L following step 1 management, adminster 6 g fast acting carbohydrate.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 15 minute. Notify provider with result
STEP 2: If repeat blood glucose greater than 3.5 mmol/L
Hypoglycemia Management Instructions

If POC Glucose Whole Blood number 2 is greater than 3.5 mmol/L following step 1 management, give oral feed as ordered as provider.  Recheck POC Glucose Whole Blood in 30 minute. Notify provider if repeat is less than 3.5 mmol/L
Term Infant Formula - Standard (Non-NICU)
T;N
Term Infant Formula - Therapeutic (Non-NICU)
T;N
Breastfeed, Exclusive
T;N
Expressed Breast Milk - EBM (Non-NICU)
T;N
Continuous Infusions
If patient is alert, but cannot be treated with oral glucose (e.g. NPO or vomiting), or is unconcious and/or seizing
dextrose 10% (D10W) bolus
2 mL/kg, IV, q10min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: bag
If patient is unconscious and/or seizing with IV access
dextrose 10% (D10W) bolus
2 mL/kg, IV, once, drug form: bag
Medications
Select one glucagon order
dextrose
6 g, PO, q15min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: tab
If patient is alert but cannot be treated with oral glucose (e.g. NPO or vomiting) without IV access
glucagon (GLUCAGON)
0.02 mg, subcutaneous, q15min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: kit
0.03 mg, subcutaneous, q15min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: kit
0.04 mg, subcutaneous, q15min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: kit
If patient is unconscious and/or seizing without IV access
glucagon (GLUCAGON)
0.03 mg/kg, IM, q15min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: kit
0.5 mg, IM, q15min, PRN hypoglycemia, drug form: kit
